net.openhft.chronicle.algo.locks

Interface ReadWriteUpdateLockingStrategy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LockingStrategy, ReadWriteLockingStrategy
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ReadWriteUpdateWithWaitsLockingStrategy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VanillaReadWriteUpdateWithWaitsLockingStrategy

    public interface ReadWriteUpdateLockingStrategy
extends ReadWriteLockingStrategy
    Logic of read-write-update lock state transitions. Read lock - could be several at the same time. Update lock - doesn't block reads, but couldn't be several update locks at the same time Write lock - exclusive
